title: refactor: move all generated content to news branch
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: The hive is getting tidy
gist.blurb: We've moved all generated news content to its own branch to keep main clean and code-focused.
gist.summary: Refactored the social pipeline to commit generated content to a dedicated `news` branch, removing over 200 stale artifacts from `main`.
gist.impact: Developers will see a cleaner main branch history without generated JSON and image files cluttering the diffs.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee mascot acting as a librarian or archivist, sorting files. Two distinct piles: one for code (clean, organized) and one for news/media (colorful, dynamic). The bee is happily moving a stack of papers from the main area to a special 'News' bin.

Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'CLEANUP'.
